allow: Bash(# Kill existing processes pkill -f ""vite"" pkill -f ""node.*backend/dist"" pkill -f ""ts-node.*backend"" sleep 2 # Verify killed lsof -i :5173 -i :3000)

Bash(# Start backend cd ""/Users/mikeroy/Downloads/Telegram Desktop/playwright-web-app/backend"" npm run dev 2>&1 & echo ""Backend starting..."" sleep 3 # Check backend health curl -s http://localhost:3000/health)
Bash(# Check ALL running dev servers echo ""=== Ports in use ==="" lsof -i :5173 -i :5174 -i :5175 -i :5176 -i :3000 -i :3001)

Bash(# Kill ALL node processes related to this project pkill -f ""vite"" pkill -f ""playwright-web-app/backend"" sleep 2 # Verify all killed echo ""=== After cleanup ==="" lsof -i :5173 -i :5174 -i :5175 -i :5176 -i :3000)

Bash(# Start frontend on port 5173 cd ""/Users/mikeroy/Downloads/Telegram Desktop/playwright-web-app/frontend"" npm run dev 2>&1 & sleep 4 # Check what port it''s on grep -o ""http://localhost:[0-9]*"" /tmp/frontend.log)
Bash(# Kill the frontend that just started on 5174 pkill -f ""vite"" sleep 1 # Check what''s on 5173 lsof -i :5173 # Kill anything on 5173 lsof -i :5173 -t)

Bash(# Check GitHub integration status curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/github/integration \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOiI5YzllMWE4Ny1jZGFjLTQxNGQtODIzMC1kZTYxOTcxZWE3OTQiLCJpYXQiOjE3Njc4MjQ4NTQsImV4cCI6MTc2ODQyOTY1NH0.qEjY-vhKnXGfDoidhYybneGV6YiWkSyeWY0ZjSs4sNY"")

Bash(# Try to trigger a workflow directly curl -s -X POST ""http://localhost:3000/api/github/runs/trigger"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOiI5YzllMWE4Ny1jZGFjLTQxNGQtODIzMC1kZTYxOTcxZWE3OTQiLCJpYXQiOjE3Njc4MjQ4NTQsImV4cCI6MTc2ODQyOTY1NH0.qEjY-vhKnXGfDoidhYybneGV6YiWkSyeWY0ZjSs4sNY"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{ ""owner"": ""y9g7bg5qbj-arch"", ""repo"": ""playwright-web-app"", ""workflowFile"": ""vero-tests.yml"" }'')

Bash(# Try with correct field name curl -s -X POST ""http://localhost:3000/api/github/runs/trigger"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOiI5YzllMWE4Ny1jZGFjLTQxNGQtODIzMC1kZTYxOTcxZWE3OTQiLCJpYXQiOjE3Njc4MjQ4NTQsImV4cCI6MTc2ODQyOTY1NH0.qEjY-vhKnXGfDoidhYybneGV6YiWkSyeWY0ZjSs4sNY"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{ ""owner"": ""y9g7bg5qbj-arch"", ""repo"": ""playwright-web-app"", ""workflowPath"": "".github/workflows/vero-tests.yml"" }'')

Bash(# Check for new run sleep 3 curl -s ""https://api.github.com/repos/y9g7bg5qbj-arch/playwright-web-app/actions/runs?per_page=3"" \\ -H ""Authorization: token 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"")
